paper_abstract: We investigate univariate and bivariate binary subdivision schemes based on cubic B-splines with double knots. It turns out that double knots change the behaviour of a uniform cubic scheme from primal to dual. We focus on the analysis of new bivariate cubic schemes with double knots at extraordinary points. These cubic schemes produce C-1 surfaces with the original Doo-Sabin weights. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Cubic subdivision schemes with double knots
